title: sharpBettingApps
author: sharpBettingApps
content: First a quick bit about me:I have been specializing in web scraping, software development and automation for about 10 years.  Of those 10 years the last several have been spent almost entirely focused on gambling automation (placing edge bets automatically).If you have accounts with a small book that has a website and are looking to get regular sharp/edge bets to make a profit over time PM me. For examples of the sites I am talking about PM.Thanks!I've included some screenshots to show what these sites typically look like.https://i.postimg.cc/8f6PDg4N/site-example.pnghttps://i.postimg.cc/8J3PqzhZ/site-example-2.png

comments.author: worldreporter
comments.body: Actually, there are not a lot of great online casinos. I am pretty sure that syndicate casino https://syndicatekasino.fi/ will make your life better because it's goal is not to steal money but to be honest with you. If you want to quit your job and make a living from playing a casino it's your best choice!

comments.author: Bushdark
comments.body: I can smell you shill attempt here but I think you would have to stick to rules so as not to cause a contrary view about the casino you are trying to shill. If you are part of the team and you would like to create an announcement thread about your casino, then it would be far better better to do that than trying to promote to the casino. Since you are looking for partners the await those who will be interested in service. You can as well move this to the service board for more visibility or better still, give a comprehensive description about your service.

comments.author: klidex
comments.body: Quote from: sharpBettingApps on July 20, 2022, 05:46:19 PMFirst a quick bit about me:I have been specializing in web scraping, software development and automation for about 10 years.  Of those 10 years the last several have been spent almost entirely focused on gambling automation (placing edge bets automatically).If you have accounts with a small book that has a website and are looking to get regular sharp/edge bets to make a profit over time PM me. For examples of the sites I am talking about PM.Thanks!I've included some screenshots to show what these sites typically look like.It looks like you are offering betting predictions and looking for partners to bet with the aim that bettors can benefit from time to time, but can your offer be trusted and accounted for.If indeed your offer to find a partner in betting can be trusted and you can be responsible, then it would be better for you to be able to provide a guarantee.It's not that I don't believe in it or want to make forum users hesitate to become your partner, but it's just that currently there are many cases of fraud so that in the future there will be no more victims especially for members in this forum.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: sharpBettingApps on July 20, 2022, 05:46:19 PMIf you have accounts with a small book that has a website and are looking to get regular sharp/edge bets to make a profit over time PM me. For examples of the sites I am talking about PM.The internet is the field of scammers, they have various tricks and modes, maybe countless tricks and modes that scammers use, starting with analysis, predictions, regular bets, dealers, partners and so on, which at the end of the story is extortion and loses in gambling, that's a fact that often happens in the world of online gambling.I also think, humans are never ending greed in making money, if you are experienced in the field of development, web, gambling, software, expert in regular edge bets and can make big profits, why don't you bet yourself or become a bookie yourself, to make big profits.Notes:Partners or dealers, don't want to work with you, they trust the parties/management of gambling sites directly, rather than trusting you whose origins are unclear, You could have appeared today, after getting your prey disappeared without a trace, your tricks are old-fashioned, partners and bookies are not stupid.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Quote from: sharpBettingApps on July 20, 2022, 05:46:19 PM...If you have accounts with a small book that has a website and are looking to get regular sharp/edge bets to make a profit over time PM me. For examples of the sites I am talking about PM.Thanks!....First: I guess that many gamblers potentially interested in something like this would request the same question: "what is an account in a site with a small book" ?Why not post directly here?Secondly: For what I can understand this is something called "radar betting", considered a scam by all bookmakers... one of the leading reason a lot of gamblers didn't receive their payout/cashout...

comments.author: Cryptomiles1
comments.body: What i noticed most time is that, newbies often use all this to scam people over here but forgotten that they have to build reputation before they could request for any partnership.Quote from: worldreporter on January 18, 2023, 11:31:31 AMActually, there are not a lot of great online casinos. I am pretty sure that syndicate casino https://syndicatekasino.fi/ will make your life better because it's goal is not to steal money but to be honest with you. If you want to quit your job and make a living from playing a casino it's your best choice!Btw, haven't heard about syndicatekasino, how come its not popular over here or who have tried it before, even trying bet using the casino site?

comments.author: Blawpaw
comments.body: Quote from: sharpBettingApps on July 20, 2022, 05:46:19 PMFirst a quick bit about me:I have been specializing in web scraping, software development and automation for about 10 years.  Of those 10 years the last several have been spent almost entirely focused on gambling automation (placing edge bets automatically).If you have accounts with a small book that has a website and are looking to get regular sharp/edge bets to make a profit over time PM me. For examples of the sites I am talking about PM.Thanks!I've included some screenshots to show what these sites typically look like.I cannot understand what do you expect out of this post. Strangely enough you are a newbie on the forum and you did not lost any time to try and find a partner overhere, even if  your post is shaddy enough. Thing is... Your post is a mess and no one will understand what kind of expertise you are showing with a couple of screenshots. My advice for you is to get a reputation first and then you canstart thinking in posting proposals that make sense.
